var.name: var

error.notbsyn: var : can not be used (basicsyn : false)

var.menual:
(!) : no action[n] usage : var [ACTION] ...
[t]delete : delete variables
[t]set : set variables, (ex) abc=1 def="123" ...
[t]help : show this message

import.error: Did not import : %s required API = %d | current API = %d

sprexor.load:
version codename apiversion
fnls/basic fnls/uv fnls/uc fnls/wn fnls/db
bcml/a bcml/b bcml/c bcml/d
bcm/help bcm/help/name bcm/help/helpmsg bcm/var/name bcm/var/error/notbysn bcm/var/error/badformat bcm/var/error/default bcm/var/menual bcm/var/helpmsg bcm/echo/name bcm/var/helpmsg bcm/commands/name bcm/commands/helpmsg
import/error activate/error
parser/error/syntax parser/error/bsp parser/error/nv parser/error.iv
